reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Kestävä Teko ja vaikutus on jatkoa käynnissä olevalle Kestavä TEKO-hankkeelle (2015-2017) ja sitä edeltäneelle TEKO -hankkeelle (2014) ja muille edeltäville hankkeille. Hankkeen aikana vakiinnutetaan koulujen toimintaa palkataan lisää opettajia k ehitetään opetuksen tasoa ja opettajien osaamista. Tarkempi kuvaus muissa osa-alueissa ja hankeasiakirjassa

The aim of this project is to expand the already going on education project in Gedo region of Somalia to contribute a sustainable development. To make sure the project sustainability after 7-years we have communicated with the Somalia Ministry of Education and gave us the guarantee for project continuation after completion of this particular 7years project; therefore the ministry gave us a written agreement. The project will also in cooperate with local regional local administration local partners and other organizations active in the region. Also the project will also incorporate with a Finnish professional vocational School (INOMNIA) to provide curriculum co-operation and teacher training needs assessment in 2014 in Mandera Kenya. This project funding is s ought for the period 2015-2017 where the total duration of this project plan is 2013-2021 (9 years) where two years have already completed. The project has been able to offer preventive mechanism for young people from drifting extremists and other criminal activities in the conflict areas and demonstrated the importance of educational development of a peaceful environment that provides a positive option for the youth and hope for the future. This project will make sure the equity and inclusiveness with par ticular emphasis with the positive gender discrimination and encourage the minority groups of the society. The project will reduce inequalities by providing equal opportunity for all qualified youth groups to enrol the school regardless of their socio-ec onomic status gender and age. In addition to the technical education focussing on the youth the year 2015 the project will support the salary for 5 teachers of Garbolow primary school located in the village near Luq district of Gedo region. This school was constructed and supported by ARD/Ganaanne and the Diaspora community in 2008. Till that time teachers did not get sustainable support therefore supporting of 5 teachers will help the smooth running of the school. The primary functions of the project are o riented to increase the resources in teaching and to improve the quality by organizing updating education to the teachers and by developing curriculums.Somalians equality in relations with the Europeans. Professional expertise is central to the future comp etitivenessThe improvement of the level of education will hopefully spread to the whole of Somalia. In 2015-2017 steps are taken to increase effectiveness

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is a secondary priority area in this activity
Improving democracy in societies is a secondary priority area in this activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is the main priority area in this activ ity
